dct_description_sm: California with two bays in the north and a large bay to the northeast.  Mare Rubrum north of the island and south of Anian.  A large lion sits between the two hemispheres with a paw on each one.  Above the lion’s head is the sun’s orbit between the Zodiac signs Cancer and Libra.  Below the map is a banner reading, “Nominis Austriaci Culmen fideique Columna iste leo gemini, Carolvs, orbis amor.”Henricus Cause’ Sculpsit (lower right).Issued in his: El Atlas Abreviado ..., 1696.Issued in his: El Atlas Abreviado, O Compendiosa Geographia del Mundo Antigvo, Y Nuevo ... Segunda Edicion. / Don Francisco de Aefferden. --  En Amberes [Antwerp] : Por Juan Duren. Ano 1697.
